beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* repeatedly calls to HTTP server, with defined intervals and number of polls * writes the result to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that calls to an HTTP server
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config polling-reader.xml
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
You need to provide a valid URL to an HTTP server and, if needed, a proxy server (all are properties on the Reader bean below).

bean.description: This creates the simple router Reader -> Writer.
Poller which wraps HTTP Reader and polls 5 times every 5 seconds. (More example config parameters commented out.)
Reader which polls HTTP server using configured URL.
